metadata.title: CVE-2024-3859 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: On 32-bit versions there were integer-overflows that led to anout-of-bounds-read that potentially could be triggered by a malformedOpenType font. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 125, Firefox ESR <115.10, and Thunderbird < 115.10.

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
